revised_title: A New Method for Quantitative Estimation of Micro-organisms in the Atmosphere
tldr: The author presents a new method for estimating the number of microorganisms in the air using a solid medium and a simple apparatus. This method allows for a larger volume of air to be analyzed and provides more accurate results, making it a valuable tool for studying the distribution of microorganisms in the atmosphere.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Air Quality
